title: Barbarian / Active (~85)
comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the zone you're farming in.
*2 = After maxing damage talents, go for HP to boost "Meatshank" bonus
comment_two:
*60 After maxing "Carry a Big Stick", place excess points into "Absolute Unit" and level it above 60. 
*1 = The rest of the excess points go into HP to try and improve "Meatshank" bonus.
comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Apocalypse Zow" (To either 99 or 132, level in-between are useless), then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be split between the two active skills.
notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.
